mapper.sql: SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.TSSDGROUPDETAILID, t1.TSSDGROUPDETAILNAME, t1.TSSDGROUPID, t11.TSSDGROUPNAME, t1.TSSDITEMID, t21.TSSDITEMNAME, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN FROM T_SRFTSSDGROUPDETAIL t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFTSSDGROUP t11 ON t1.TSSDGROUPID = t11.TSSDGROUPID LEFT JOIN T_SRFTSSDITEM t21 ON t1.TSSDITEMID = t21.TSSDITEMID

SELECT t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`TSSDGROUPDETAILID`, t1.`TSSDGROUPDETAILNAME`, t1.`TSSDGROUPID`, t11.`TSSDGROUPNAME`, t1.`TSSDITEMID`, t21.`TSSDITEMNAME`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN` FROM `T_SRFTSSDGROUPDETAIL` t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFTSSDGROUP t11 ON t1.TSSDGROUPID = t11.TSSDGROUPID LEFT JOIN T_SRFTSSDITEM t21 ON t1.TSSDITEMID = t21.TSSDITEMID

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.TSSDGROUPDETAILID, t1.TSSDGROUPDETAILNAME, t1.TSSDGROUPID, t11.TSSDGROUPNAME, t1.TSSDITEMID, t21.TSSDITEMNAME, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN FROM T_TSSDGROUPDETAIL t1 LEFT JOIN T_TSSDGROUP t11 ON t1.TSSDGROUPID = t11.TSSDGROUPID LEFT JOIN T_TSSDITEM t21 ON t1.TSSDITEMID = t21.TSSDITEMID

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE AS CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN AS CREATEMAN, t1.TSSDGROUPDETAILID AS TSSDGROUPDETAILID, t1.TSSDGROUPDETAILNAME AS TSSDGROUPDETAILNAME, t1.TSSDGROUPID AS TSSDGROUPID, t11.TSSDGROUPNAME AS TSSDGROUPNAME, t1.TSSDITEMID AS TSSDITEMID, t21.TSSDITEMNAME AS TSSDITEMNAME, t1.UPDATEDATE AS UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN AS UPDATEMAN FROM T_SRFTSSDGROUPDETAIL t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFTSSDGROUP t11 ON t1.TSSDGROUPID = t11.TSSDGROUPID LEFT JOIN T_SRFTSSDITEM t21 ON t1.TSSDITEMID = t21.TSSDITEMID

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE AS CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN AS CREATEMAN, t1.TSSDGROUPDETAILID AS TSSDGROUPDETAILID, t1.TSSDGROUPDETAILNAME AS TSSDGROUPDETAILNAME, t1.TSSDGROUPID AS TSSDGROUPID, t11.TSSDGROUPNAME AS TSSDGROUPNAME, t1.TSSDITEMID AS TSSDITEMID, t21.TSSDITEMNAME AS TSSDITEMNAME, t1.UPDATEDATE AS UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN AS UPDATEMAN FROM T_SRFTSSDGROUPDETAIL t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFTSSDGROUP t11 ON t1.TSSDGROUPID = t11.TSSDGROUPID LEFT JOIN T_SRFTSSDITEM t21 ON t1.TSSDITEMID = t21.TSSDITEMID

SELECT t1.[CREATEDATE], t1.[CREATEMAN], t1.[TSSDGROUPDETAILID], t1.[TSSDGROUPDETAILNAME], t1.[TSSDGROUPID], t11.[TSSDGROUPNAME], t1.[TSSDITEMID], t21.[TSSDITEMNAME], t1.[UPDATEDATE], t1.[UPDATEMAN] FROM [T_SRFTSSDGROUPDETAIL] t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFTSSDGROUP t11 ON t1.TSSDGROUPID = t11.TSSDGROUPID LEFT JOIN T_SRFTSSDITEM t21 ON t1.TSSDITEMID = t21.TSSDITEMID
